docs.text: ▀▄▀▄▀▄ inviter ▀▄▀▄▀▄ Discord invite embeds! Github: github.com/whinee/inviter Website: inviter.whinyaan.xyz github.com/whinee/inviter is a fork of SwitchbladeBot/invidget , aiming to provide more cuztomizeability in regards to the SVGs colors. To be updated, be sure to watch this repository. For the legals, visit LICENSE . Interested in commisioning projects? Inquire through Discord( whi_ne | whinyaan.xyz#5135 ) or through e-mail( whinyaan@pm.me ). Pricing starts at 15 USD. Features inviter generates SVG renders of Discord invites that can be used in GitHub READMEs or even websites. These are a great way to increase conversions and get more people to join your server. Usage Dark theme (default) Format: https://inviter.whinyaan.xyz/{code} Light theme https://inviter.whinyaan.xyz/{code}?theme=light Different language https://inviter.whinyaan.xyz/{code}?language=pt inviter uses ISO 639-1 code for identifying languages. Customize colors https://inviter.whinyaan.xyz/${code}?color[serverName]=d64f50&color[header]=9383e2&color[presenceText]=684fe2 Structure color ├── joinButtonBackground │ ├── joinButtonText │ ├── online │ ├── members │ └── badges │ ├── PARTNERED │ │ ├── flowerStar │ │ └── icon │ └── VERIFIED │ ├── flowerStar │ └── icon ├── background ├── serverName ├── header ├── serverIcon ├── acronymText └── presenceText To modify the color of flowerStar badge of PARTNERED , use the following query parameter: color[badges][PARTNERED][flowerStar]={hex} Notes The color customization precedes the theme License MIT Copyright for portions of project inviter are held by [Switchblade, Github account SwitchbladeBot owner, 2019] as part of project invidget , by [whi_ne, Github account whinee owner, 2022] as part of project hyaku , and by [whi_ne, Github account whinee owner, 2022] as part of project YAMHL . All other copyright for project inviter are held by [Github Account whinee Owner, 2022]. Check the license for more details. Credits MIT Logo Massachusetts Institute of Technology (vectorized by Mysid , modified by whinee ), Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons Icons Exclamation Mark , Code Fork , Star , Group , Code , and Discord icons by Icons8 NOTE: If a reference or source material is not attributed properly or not at all, please kindly message me at Discord: whi_ne | whinyaan.xyz#5135 or create a pull request so I can properly give credit to their respective authors.
